price: Ìjọ kan kúkú ti bèèrè rẹ̀ ṣíwájú yín. Lẹ́yìn náà, wọ́n sì di aláìgbàgbọ́ nípasẹ̀ rẹ̀.
arabic: قَدۡ سَأَلَهَا قَوۡمٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكُمۡ ثُمَّ أَصۡبَحُواْ بِهَا كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qad sa-alahā qawmun min qablikum thumma aṣbaḥū bihā kāfirīna
